title: Bug 3622: New Package Wizard has confusing message
description: Bug 3622: The New Package Wizard displays a confusing message when trying to create a new package.
OB: When creating a new package in the New Package Wizard, the message displayed is not clear and may lead to confusion.
EB: When creating a new package in the New Package Wizard, a clear and concise message should be displayed to guide the user.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a new Java Project.
2. Select the project.
3. Open the New Package Wizard.
